name: Littorch
tagline: A simple lightweight torch app for Android.
body:
###Welcome to LitTorch

![](http://i.imgur.com/TO8oE2Y.png)

LitTorch is a lightweight basic Android app that allows you to activate the flash on your phone or tablet instantly.

####The focus
If your phone/tablet does not give you the option to activate a torch you are left with apps that are on the store, the focus is performance, there is no graphics and all the functionality is performed code side so there is nothing major to affect the performance when opening the app. 


####Installing

Because this app is not on the play store you are left to install it yourself, you can grab the latest release [here](https://github.com/remony/litTorch/releases) or you can clone/download this project and compile it yourself.

####Note

You are free to fork and modify the project, but please provide a link to this project.
